    • Method Detail

      • withPartitionKey

        public CreateTableStatementBuilder.Buildable withPartitionKey(java.lang.String columnName,
                                                              DataType dataType)
        Adds a partition key column definition. This includes the column declaration (you don't need an additional CreateTableStatementBuilder.Buildable.withColumn(String, DataType) or CreateTableStatementBuilder.Buildable.withColumns(Map) call). Partition key columns are added in the order of their declaration.
        Parameters:
        columnName - the column name of the partition key column
        dataType - the data type of the partition key column
        Returns:
        a builder object

      • withPartitionKey

        public CreateTableStatementBuilder.Buildable withPartitionKey(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,DataType> columnNameAndDataTypeMap)
        Adds partition key column definitions. This includes the column declarations (you don't need an additional CreateTableStatementBuilder.Buildable.withColumn(String, DataType) or CreateTableStatementBuilder.Buildable.withColumns(Map) call). Partition key columns are added in the order of their declaration.
        Parameters:
        columnNameAndDataTypeMap - a map of the column names and the data types of the partition key columns
        Returns:
        a builder object
